sentences: Steven Paul (born May 16, 1959) is an American independent film producer, screenwriter, director, actor, and talent manager.
At the age of 21 years old, he was the youngest person to ever direct a major studio film with his directorial debut
He is also actor Jon Voight's manager, and previously managed Gene Wilder, Michael Cimino, and Bob Clark.
In 2000, MM Media and Crystal Sky had a 12-picture co-financing deal.
In January 2017, he purchased Echo Bridge.
